sentences.english: In the US, Tibetan mastiff pups can be bought for as little as several hundred dollars, Feltenstein said.
sentences.chinese: 費爾滕斯坦說，在美國，區區幾百美元就能買到藏獒。

sentences.english: Don't you see: Britain and Japan, only three islands, still prosper.
sentences.chinese: 君不見英日區區三島尚崛起。

sentences.english: Fabio Capello"s England also has just a 4pc chance, it said."
sentences.chinese: 而卡佩羅率領的英格蘭隊也區區只有4%的奪冠機率。

sentences.english: We can only offer you a beggarly two hundred pounds to start with.
sentences.chinese: 一開始我們只能給你區區二百英鎊作爲酬金。

sentences.english: The other Chinese knickknacks they found sold for as little as $65.
sentences.chinese: 他們找到的其他中國小物件只賣了區區65美元。

sentences.english: Cool down ; there's no need to lose your temper over such a trivial matter.
sentences.chinese: 冷靜些，沒有必要爲如此區區小事而大動肝火。

sentences.english: Hold a heart, fear not Jun cha.
sentences.chinese: 一心抱區區，懼君不識察。

sentences.english: He was treating the whole thing as a joke.
sentences.chinese: 他把整個事情當作區區小事。

sentences.english: Just 12 bottles were made and the company has already sold out.
sentences.chinese: 該公司釀製的區區12瓶“歷史終點”已經搶購一空。

sentences.english: In 1993, there were only 480 calling males left in the entire nation.
sentences.chinese: 1993年，全國僅剩下區區480只打鳴雄性秧雞。

sentences.english: In the US, Tibetan mastiff pups can be bought for as little as several hundred dollars, Feltenstein said。
sentences.chinese: 費爾滕斯坦說，在美國，區區幾百美元就能買到藏獒。

sentences.english: Do you think Lal will care for anything so unimportant?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲拉爾會看上如此無足輕重的區區之物嗎？

sentences.english: We all believe it no good quarrelling over such trifles.
sentences.chinese: 咱們都以爲位這類區區小事口角沒有好處。

sentences.english: Don't make a fuss about such trifles.
sentences.chinese: 不要爲區區小事而大驚小怪。

sentences.english: We should never underestimate the issue of theme.
sentences.chinese: 千萬別小覷了這區區的題材小事。

sentences.english: You need not worry over such a matter.
sentences.chinese: 你無需爲區區小事而憂慮。

definition: then/at once/always/(archaic) luggage rack on a chariot
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
